reviews.review_text: Dr. Kumar explains data structures with great clarity and provides excellent examples.
The course content was good, but the pace was a bit fast for beginners.
One of the best professors I've had. Very knowledgeable and approachable.

The concepts were well taught, but the grading seemed a bit harsh.
Fantastic teacher with a deep understanding of algorithms. Highly recommended.
